name: Origin Import Filter File
summary: Learn about .OIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OIF import filters are designed to allow users to save settings for importing different data types into Origin. When a user selects File → Import → Import Wizard..., he can choose to apply an import filter for the current data type.

description: An OIF file is a data file used by Origin, a data analysis and graphing application used by various scientists and engineers. It contains import filter settings for files that are imported into Origin via the Import Wizard. OIF files also include post-import processing instructions in LabTalk Script.
